code: export var BASE_URL='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';export function register(_ref){var password=_ref.password,email=_ref.email;return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(response){try{return response.json();}catch(err){return err;}}).then(function(res){return res;});}export function login(_ref2){var password=_ref2.password,email=_ref2.email;return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(response){try{return response.json();}catch(err){return err;}}).then(function(res){return res;});}export function checkToken(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(response){try{return response.json();}catch(err){return err;}}).then(function(res){return res;});}
